vocabInfos.shortDef: to hold out, spread out extend
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to hold out, spread out extend
pluperfect, ἐκπεπετάκειν, to stretch forth, spread out, expand, extend, Rom. 10:21*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 伸展開來, 向前方伸展 (羅 10:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 伸展开来, 向前方伸展 (罗 10:21)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: dang ra; ngửa tay. ἐκ (G1537) + περισσῶς (G4057)
